On this #InternationalWomensDay, join me in pledging to work every day for true equality. We must empower, trust, and respect women everywhere.

Proud to join my great friends @Rosa_DeLauro  and @RepDelBene to introduce the American Family Act—legislation that will more than triple the Child Tax Credit for families with young children. After the GOP Tax Scam, we're working for a fairer tax code for working families.

This week Congress passed sweeping bills to confront gun violence, preserve public lands, and to protect our Constitution from the President’s #FakeEmergency. We conducted aggressive oversight of Trump administration corruption. The Congress is finally working #ForThePeople.
